info.name: Diode API
info.description:
DiodeIO RESTful API for Toll Station Interoperability Data

## Base URL
Use ```https://localhost:9103/interoperability/api/```for all your requests.

## Date Formatting
Every endpoint that requires a date field must be populated with a date of the format ```YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss```, otherwise the server will respond with an invalid request error.

## JSON & CSV Functionality
Every available endpoint can respond with either JSON or CSV format. You have to specify your desired response type in the query parameter ```format={json|csv}```. By default the API will respond with JSON.

request.description: Returns all the pass events at the specified toll station and time period.
Returns all the pass events by vehicles with tags of ```op_ID2``` at toll stations of ```op_ID1``` at the specified time period.

response.name: PassesAnalysis invalid input

request.description: Returns a summary of the pass events of vehicles with tags of ```op_ID2``` at toll stations of ```op_ID1``` in the specified time period.
Returns the debts of ``op_ID`` to every other operator in the specified time period.
